data.trans: Xây dựng dần, lớn mạnh dần
data.trans_hint: Cô phải mất mười năm để xây dựng doanh nghiệp xuất bản của mình.
data.en_hint: It took her ten years to build up her publishing business.
data.content_game_1: It took her ten years to build up her publishing business.
data.answer_en_hint: It took her ten years to build up her publishing business.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi cần tiếp tục hoàn thành thời hạn.
data.en_hint: We need to carry on finishing the deadline.
data.content_game_1: We need to carry on finishing the deadline.
data.answer_en_hint: We need to carry on finishing the deadline.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi muốn khởi hành đến Paris vào 10 giờ sáng mai.
data.en_hint: We would like to set off for Paris by 10 o'clock tomorrow morning.
data.content_game_1: We would like to set off for Paris by 10 o'clock tomorrow morning.
data.answer_en_hint: We would like to set off for Paris by 10 o'clock tomorrow morning.

data.trans: Đặt mục tiêu phải làm được điều gì
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi đã hoàn thành tất cả những gì chúng tôi đặt ra.
data.en_hint: We have accomplished all we set out to do.
data.content_game_1: We have accomplished all we set out to do.
data.answer_en_hint: We have accomplished all we set out to do.

data.trans: Đỗ lại, dừng chân ở nơi nào (trong một chuyến đi đến nơi khác)
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đến Athens vào ngày 23, sau khi dừng chân ở Frankfurt.
data.en_hint: He arrived in Athens on 23rd, after stopping off at Frankfurt.
data.content_game_1: He arrived in Athens on 23rd, after stopping off at Frankfurt.
data.answer_en_hint: He arrived in Athens on 23rd, after stopping off at Frankfurt.

data.trans: Tạo thành hàng xe nối đuôi nhau (do tắc nghẽn)
data.trans_hint: Xe cộ nối đuôi nhau 5km kể từ hiện trường vụ tai nạn.
data.en_hint: Traffic tailed back five kilometers from the scene of the accident.
data.content_game_1: Traffic tailed back five kilometers from the scene of the accident.
data.answer_en_hint: Traffic tailed back five kilometers from the scene of the accident.

data.trans_hint: Khi xe chúng tôi đang đi trên đường, nó bất chợt phát ra âm thanh lạ.
data.en_hint: When our car was on the move, it suddenly made a strange sound.
data.content_game_1: When our car was on the move, it suddenly made a strange sound.
data.answer_en_hint: When our car was on the move, it suddenly made a strange sound.

data.trans_hint: Con xe rởm này đã hỏng từ năm ngoái và tôi chẳng buồn đem đi sửa nữa.
data.en_hint: This beat-up car broke down last year, and I'm too lazy to get it serviced.
data.content_game_1: This beat-up car broke down last year, and I'm too lazy to get it serviced.
data.answer_en_hint: This beat-up car broke down last year, and I'm too lazy to get it serviced.

data.trans_hint: Giao thông bị đình trệ vì có một vụ tai nạn nghiêm trọng gần chỗ bùng binh.
data.en_hint: The traffic came to a standstill as there was an serious accident near the roundabout.
data.content_game_1: The traffic came to a standstill as there was an serious accident near the roundabout.
data.answer_en_hint: The traffic came to a standstill as there was an serious accident near the roundabout.

data.trans_hint: Rất nhiều phương tiện dần nghẽn lại lúc đó để nhường đường cho ngài tổng thống đi qua.
data.en_hint: A lot of vehicles ground to a halt at that time to pave way for the president to come though.
data.content_game_1: A lot of vehicles ground to a halt at that time to pave way for the president to come though.
data.answer_en_hint: A lot of vehicles ground to a halt at that time to pave way for the president to come though.

data.trans_hint: Vì con đường này rộng và thoáng đãng, cậu có thể tăng tốc lên một chút để bù thêm chút thời gian.
data.en_hint: As this road is wide and free, you can speed up a bit to make up a bit of time.
data.content_game_1: As this road is wide and free, you can speed up a bit to make up a bit of time.
data.answer_en_hint: As this road is wide and free, you can speed up a bit to make up a bit of time.

data.trans_hint: Tôi thường đến những chỗ ít ai biết tới để khám phá thêm những điều mới.
data.en_hint: I often go to somewhere off the beaten track to explore new things.
data.content_game_1: I often go to somewhere off the beaten track to explore new things.
data.answer_en_hint: I often go to somewhere off the beaten track to explore new things.
